channel.title: Whats the code to add tokens?
channel.description:
iadded a custom token to my server: DBtokens When you want soem wht wuld the code be?
is it c.DBtokens+7+(Misc.random(7) i need this for when u kil a npc

item.title: Whats the code to add tokens?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Declare this in the player class, public int DBtokens;

then find the the NPC death method and add, c.DBtokens += #;

then save it to the playerâ€™s file.
